comments.author: Betfair23
comments.body: I think webs like binance do this kind of exchange for a lot less than 12%

comments.author: D ltr
comments.body: what are your references so that people can trust your trading?why i say that because there are too many scam nowadaysand i thought if the exchange has coins we want to sell why not go directly to the exchange from p2p like thisI applaud your efforts to collect coins from small ownersand I hope you give positive trust so that you continue to be trusted

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: Quote from: D ltr on February 17, 2023, 01:52:53 AMwhat are your references so that people can trust your trading?and i thought if the exchange has coins we want to sell why not go directly to the exchange from p2p like thisand I hope you give positive trust so that you continue to be trustedThere's no references because he haven't get any customer who successfully traded with him.Most of the times, when people are want to exchange their coins via P2P, they're want to protect their privacy even though it will cost more fees.Lol. if the @OP is giving positive feedback to his customer, actually he help to built the customer's reputation, not him. But he's not a DT member, so his feedback won't shown in trusted feedback. Giving positive feedback is need to be done for trading high amount or multiple trades, not only for one small trade.

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: jumbotrades on February 21, 2023, 02:12:29 PMi donot know how to get those yellow emojis or hero member nor interested , just business either small or big To do business in this forum, you should be interested in knowing about those so called "yellow emojis" lol. No one is going to trust a brand new account here amd neither they should.Quote from: jumbotrades on February 21, 2023, 02:12:29 PMno one can believe untill they trade better small Why should ppl risk anything to believe in you ? While they can trade risk-free on zero-trading fee exchanges like binance (and here you are taking 12-20% just as fees to trade with you).Quote from: jumbotrades on February 21, 2023, 02:12:29 PMi am since cryptsy and mtgox btce a lot may not even know them You maybe old in the crypto space as you speak (which I doubt lol) but you are very new to the forum with no contributions whatsoever. There is no point to believe in your words.Quote from: jumbotrades on February 21, 2023, 02:12:29 PMi just earn a small rate i know once someone trust they will come by Okay, while I know there would be little to none interested to deal with you with such high rates, I'd still suggest you to catch a reputable escrow who can hold the funds on your behalf while an innocent guy tries to deal with you.

comments.author: Bestdss
comments.body: A lot of people are now forming cryptocurrency exchanges on Bitcointalk. I hope you guys do this with all sincerity coz a lot of newbies are in the space who might not know their left from right. I really wish this avenue for crypto exchange should be redifined maybe into a registered website or app under any financial regulation to be sure people are safe. Money transactions requires great trust from the providers to be sure their funds are safe even with Escrow.
